Dateline:
The University of Minnesota should report patients' medical issues during clinical trials faster, according to Minnesota's legislative auditor.

A new report was released that examined the school's last decade of industry-sponsored studies. It found some researchers took months to report patient hospitalizations and in some cases submitted little information on adverse events during the trials.
